title: Just purchased ezreal, any tips?
body: He's fun to play but I still dont know much about him. Any tips would help!

replies.body:
Save your E, don't engage on it.  
You don't always want to use Q immediately.  AA>Q to cancel the end of your AA animation.  
Start stacking your passive on minions if your jgler is closing in for a gank.

ezreal has low damage, he just deals his damage multiple times

don't gimp yourself trying to match other adcs. Go in with a strategy for ezreal not for adcs in general. 

Ezreal is a caster adc not a general adc. Same as {{champion:15}}  and {{champion:42}} 

Also don't trust ezreal mains when they tell you about his amazing damage, 90% of them wouldn't know great damage from shit damage or burst from sustained damage. 

Also learn how wave control works and why it might be smart to ult lane minions from across the map even if they aren't at your tower.
He has a nice early game. Try to make the most of it. If you want damage but{{item:3078}} . If you're against a counter and to play more defensively buy {{item:3025}}

I don't get him, his build is supposedly ad, and so is his Q, . . . but his last 3 abilities are ap . . . 
what!?
They may deal magic damage, but his E and R both have ad ratios...

dont use your E offensively at all. now you can use your E offensively when you get a lot better at ezreal and the game. but for now unless your chasing a guarantee cleanup kill. don't use your E to do damage. especially in team fight. if you waste your E you die. ezreal doesn't have as much sustained damage as jinx or such so its easy for tanks to jump on him without worrying much about getting deleted.

E drains your very limited MP pool, try to conserve it.
Q is super cheap in comparison, literally use it as often as possible.
Q is for poking, not for Csing. If you can't Cs without Q, practice more in bot/custom games.
E allows you to jump out of some annoying CC like Blitz hooks. Very useful  kite/escape ability.
Go with the Iceborn builds. Enuff said. AP ez sucks now.
The ult is a good finisher tool (just like Draven's, really), but is also useful to deshove minions to save a tower. It's CD is not bad, but it has a fairly long channel/cast time, so be careful not to be CCed while ulting.
